title: ‘I Will Fight All the Way to Rome’: Richard Carapaz Emerges as the Most Dangerous Giro d’Italia GC Disruptor
content:
Carapaz crashes, attacks, and claws back onto the virtual podium, now third at just 31 seconds off pink after the day's big GC fireworks in San Valentino.

Read the full article at ‘I Will Fight All the Way to Rome’: Richard Carapaz Emerges as the Most Dangerous Giro d’Italia GC Disruptor on Velo.
author: ahood
